Hey I need you to update the README of the repository. This project is a way for people to get spreaded context of all of the AIs distributed across the entire theme. The way it works is Ultracontext ingests all of the context of the coding agents. It fits the MCP, and you can query directly on the Chat TPT or whatever agent and have real-time knowledge of all of the work of the team.
